name: Lonely Planet South America on a Shoestring 13th Edition
categories: South America on a Shoestring 13th Edition
description: Create your own adventure and optimize your budget with this travel guide. South America is full of diverse landscapes to discover. Trek to Machu Picchu, float down the Amazon, learn tango in Buenos Aires, or attend an outdoor festival. Use the colour maps, itineraries, and reviews on accommodation, restaurants and activities to help you plan your perfect trip.
